TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDataProvider extends System.Windows.Data.DataSourceProvider implements class System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext
Public Class XmlDataProvider Inherits DataSourceProvider Implements IUriContext

summary.span: 啟用對於 XML 資料的宣告式存取以進行資料繫結。

span.span: Enables declarative access to XML data for data binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 在部分信任沙箱，失敗時沒有指定的資料存取權限。In a partial-trust sandbox, fails when it does not have permissions to access the given data. 如需部分信任安全性的詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF 部分信任安全性](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)。For more information about partial trust security, see [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md). 會公開下列方式來存取[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]資料。 exposes the following ways to access [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data. - 您可以將內嵌內嵌[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]資料使用類別。You can embed inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data using the class. - 您可以設定屬性的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]資料檔案。You can set the property to the of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data file. - 您可以設定屬性。You can set the property to an . 執行完整的重新整理的所有繫結時就會發生事件。 performs a full refresh of all bindings when a event occurs. 沒有任何特定節點的最佳化。There are no optimizations for specific nodes. 屬性設定為`true`根據預設，這表示擷取資料，並產生的集合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]節點依預設以非同步的方式。The property is set to `true` by default, which means that the retrieves data and produces the collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] nodes asynchronously by default.

summary.span: 準備載入內嵌 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] 或外部 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] 檔案，以產生 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] 節點的集合。

span.span: Prepares the loading of either the inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] or the external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] file to produce a collection of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行時立即或在背景執行緒，根據值屬性。The execution is either immediate or on a background thread, based on the value of the property. 這個方法會呼叫和基底類別的方法。This method is called by the and methods of the base class.

summary.span: 取得或設定要作為繫結來源的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the to use as the binding source.
The to use as the binding source.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會公開下列方式來存取[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]資料。 exposes the following ways to access [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data. - 您可以將內嵌內嵌[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]資料使用類別。You can embed inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data using the class. - 您可以設定屬性的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]資料檔案。You can set the property to the of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data file. - 您可以將此屬性設定為。You can set this property to an . 當上執行完整的重新整理的所有繫結就會發生事件。 performs a full refresh of all bindings on when a event occurs. 沒有任何特定節點的最佳化。There are no optimizations for specific nodes. 如果屬性是設定，則任何內嵌[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]丟棄的資料。If the property is set, then any inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data is discarded. 如果屬性設定，然後在清除屬性和任何內嵌[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]丟棄的資料。If the property is set, then the property is cleared and any inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data is discarded. 設定下列屬性會以隱含方式會造成這重新整理的物件： ， ， ，和。Setting the following properties will implicitly cause this object to refresh: , , , and . 變更多個重新整理造成屬性時，使用建議。When changing multiple refresh-causing properties, the use of is recommended.

span.span: if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這`ShouldSerialize`方法提供，因為屬性並沒有簡單的預設值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 這個方法會指出屬性是否已變更其預設值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 如果您開發的設計工具通常呼叫這個方法或開發您自己的控制項加入。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the .

summary.span: 取得或設定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] 資料檔案的 ，以用來作為繫結來源。

value.span: 的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]来作為繫結來源的資料檔案。

span.span: The of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data file to use as the binding source.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會公開下列方式來存取[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]資料。 exposes the following ways to access [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data. - 您可以將內嵌內嵌[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]資料使用類別。You can embed inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data using the class. - 您可以將此屬性設定為的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]資料檔案。You can set this property to the of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data file. - 您可以設定屬性。You can set the property to an . 如果屬性是設定，則任何內嵌[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]丟棄的資料。If the property is set, then any inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data is discarded. 如果屬性設定，然後在清除屬性和任何內嵌[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]丟棄的資料。If the property is set, then the property is cleared and any inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data is discarded. 設定下列屬性會以隱含方式會造成這重新整理的物件： ， ， ，和。Setting the following properties will implicitly cause this object to refresh: , , , and . 變更多個重新整理造成屬性時，使用建議。When changing multiple refresh-causing properties, the use of is recommended. ## Examples 在某些應用程式，內嵌[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]內的內嵌[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]頁面可能不太方便，因為必須在編譯時期已知資料的確切內容。In some applications, embedding the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] inline within the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page can be inconvenient because the exact content of the data must be known at compile time. 因此，您可以取得資料，從外部[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]檔案，如下列範例所示。Therefore, you can obtain the data from an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] file, as in the following example. [!code-xaml[XMLDataSource2#XmlFileExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XmlDataSource2/CS/Window1.xaml#xmlfileexample)] 如果[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]資料位於遠端[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]檔案中，您會定義存取資料藉由指派適當[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_url](~/includes/tla2sharptla-url-md.md)]至屬性，如下所示：If the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data resides in a remote [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] file, you define access to the data by assigning an appropriate [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_url](~/includes/tla2sharptla-url-md.md)] to the attribute as follows: ``` ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property XmlSerializer As IXmlSerializable

span.span: Gets the inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] content.
The inline [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可由剖析器來編譯的內嵌常值內容[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]資料島。This property is used by the parser to compile the literal content of the embedded [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] data island. ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` --or-- ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *elementDataRoot**elementDataRoot* 必要。Required. 括住的資料島的單一根項目。The single root element of the enclosed data island. 如果沒有單一的根目錄，`x:XData`做為資料來源無效。Without a single root, the `x:XData` is invalid as a data source. *elementData**elementData* 選擇性。Optional. 代表您資料的 XML。XML that represents your data. 項目資料可包含任意數目的項目，其他項目，依此類推，受限於一般的規則的 XML 中可包含巢狀項目。Any number of elements can be contained as element data, nested elements can be contained in other elements, and so on, subject to the general rules of XML.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ XPath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

span.span: The query used to generate the data collection.
The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會處理`XPath`運算式從屬性。The method handles the `XPath` expressions from the property. `XPath` 不支援函式。`XPath` functions are not supported. 如`XPath`運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱文件集和範例 > 一節中提供一些範例。For `XPath` expression information, see the documentation and some examples provided in the Example section. 設定下列屬性會以隱含方式會造成這重新整理的物件： ， ， ，和。Setting the following properties will implicitly cause this object to refresh: , , , and . 變更多個重新整理造成屬性時，使用建議。When changing multiple refresh-causing properties, the use of is recommended.
